resources.string: Could not set Alarm! No time set.
It appears that you opened an unsupported or corrupted file. Please select an audio file.
Show a notification when an alarm is scheduled
Set the volume level for alarms

Alarming will help you get out of bed with a smile :) Wake up to your favorite music and choose exactly what part of a song will play. Set up all your songs and Alarming will pick one. Never be annoyed by your alarm sound again!
